sentences.sContent: The land was too rocky to cultivate.
sentences.sCn: 这块地石头太多，无法耕作。

sentences.sContent: Try to cultivate a more relaxed and positive approach to life.
sentences.sCn: 要努力养成更为放松和积极的生活态度。。

sentences.sContent: ...it is imperative to cultivate the respect between generations...

remMethod.val: cult(培养， 种植) ＋ ivate(表动作) → 培养， 种植

words.tran: 可培养的，可教化的；可耕种的
培养；耕作；耕种；教化；文雅
发展（cultivate的过去分词）；耕作；教化

trans.tranOther: to prepare and use land for growing crops and plants
